alert.note: Alert for Craighead (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 9:57AM CDT until March 27 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas...Missouri... Saint Francis River at Lake City Saint Francis River near Saint Francis For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis, Lake City... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Francis River at Lake City. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding is occurring in the swamps along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Sunday was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 8.9 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
